channel.title: Client freezes when using d claw spec
channel.description: My client freezes when I use the spec with dclaws, my guess is the animations. If I'm correct does anyone have them? my client is renamed.

item.title: Client freezes when using d claw spec
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

[code]sendPacket185(7562)
4
Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1950
at client.method101(client.java:8864)
at client.method96(client.java:8616)
at client.method114(client.java:9997)
at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3950)
at client.processGameLoop(client.java:3084)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101)
at client.run(client.java:5593)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Client freezes when using d claw spec
